subject: 5 of 5,326 ATTENTION MY GOOD FRIEND, MR RONALD / AWAITS YOUR URGENT REPLY AND MAKE SURE RECONFIRM TO YOUR FULL INFORMATION TO ENABLE US PROCEED TO START PROCESSINGYOUR APPROVED SUM OF $41.5M DOLLARS INTO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT ON BEFORE NEXT WEEKEND AS EVERY THING IS READY FOR YOU TO RECEIVE YOUR APPROVED SUM OF $41.5M DOLLARS INTO YOUR BABK ACCOUNT AS YOU HAVE TO CHOOSE ONE OF THIS PAYMENT OPTIONS AS REQUESTED BELOW.
body:
Attention, Mr Ronald

FOR YOUR  INFORMATION  I AM VERY SORRY TO REPLY  YOU VERT LATE TO DUE MY
OFFICIAL DUTY TO GERMANY SL EVERY THING IS READY FOR YOU TO RECEIVE YOUR
APPROVED SUM OF $41,5M DOLLARS AS  YOU HAVE TO CHOOSE ONE  OF THIS PAYMENT
OPTIONS AS YOU YOU HAVE TO STUDY IT  CORRECTLY AS  TO ENABLE US PROCEED
TO   START PROCESSING YOUR  APPROVED SUM OF 441.5M DOLLARS ON BEFORE NEXT
WEEKEND


TERMS OF PAYMENT AS FOLLOWS WHICH YOU MUST CHOOSE ONE THIS OPTIONS
IMMEDIATELY.

1, BANK TO BANK TRANSFER / ONLINE BANKING ACCOUNT./  FORE RECEIVING YOUR
PAYMENT THROUGH BANK TO BANK TRANSFER DIRECTLY TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT THEN
ABOUT ONLINE BANKING ACCOUNT WILL REQUIRE TO OPEN A NEW BANK ACCOUNT FOR
YOU THROUGH THE PAYING BANK.


2, THROUGH CASH PAYMENT DIRECTLY TO YOUR  COUNTRY VIA COURIER AS
CONSIGNMENT THAT IS TO TRAVEL TO NETHERLANDS / HOLLAND AS YOU HAVE TO
TRAVEL TO HOLLAND TO OUR PAYMENT OFFICE  TO ENABLE YOU SIGN ALL THE
CLASSIFIED AND VITAL DOCUMENTS BY YOURSELF AND RECEIVE YOUR APPROVED 441.5M
DOLLARS  CASH THEN YOU CAN TRANSFER YOUR APPROVED PAYMENT DIRECTLY TO YOUR
BANK IN YOUR COUNTRY THROUGH THE HELP OF THE OFFICIALS RIGH THERE IN
HOLLAND.

3, THROUGH CREDITED ATM CARD  TO ENABLE YOU CASHING AT LEAST THE SUM THE OF
$30 ,000 DOLLARS THREE TIMES



 PER DAY FROM ANY BANK AROUND YOU OR AROUND THE
WORLD..
.

Your Full Name
 Your Contact Address
 Your Direct telephone. Fax Number ( if any)
 Your AGE and what you do for a living
 How Many Months Or Years in which You Have Been Expecting
 your Payment
 The Place you sent Money Last whether Nigeria or London etc
 The Last Amount of Money You sent indicating What Month and
 Year

 WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU TODAY.

Thanks for your Cooperation
Sincerely,
DR MARSH DAVID
